description.lang: DC Motor Controller for window coverings.Z-Wave DC motor control, packaged in a Plug & Play Box. Z-Wave radio allows for bi-directional RF communications with other Z-Wave products in the market. Allows for total switched load of up to 2 Amps at 27VDC. By utilizing the Z-Wave standard, the DBMZ is guaranteed interoperability between systems and devices from other Z-Wave enabled products.
